name: Doorframe OZ
description:
You turned on your old computer to find that a virus has taken over! Quick, remove all of the infected files and kill the virus with just your mouse cursor. Be careful though, if your health reaches 0, the computer will bug out and blue screen!

Can you make it on the top 10 online leaderboard? Good luck!

(All programming, art, and music was made by ClawBoomGames and 7SevenStudios in 1 month for the GitHub Game-Off 2021 Jam)
